pluginstrument.author: Russ Barlow & Simstrumentation
pluginstrument.description:
CIRRUS SF50 VISION JET FLAP ACTUATOR
Made by SIMSTRUMENTATION and Russ Barlow GitHub: https://simstrumentation.com
Flap actuator for the Vision Jet by FlightFX
Version info: - **v1.0** - 2022-12-11
NOTES: - Made for the FlightFX Vision Jet - Should work in most MSFS GA aircraft, but compatibility not guaranteed.
KNOWN ISSUES: - None
ATTRIBUTION: Based on code and graphics from Russ Barlow. Used with permission. Sharing or re-use of any code or assets is not permitted without credit to the original authors.
